name: ANCRDT_ACCNTNG_C generation rule
description: This generation rule aims to describe the generation of ANCRDT_ACCNTNG_C table within BIRD.
algorithm:
SET ANCRDT_ACCNTNG_C.INSTRMNT_ID = BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID
WHERE BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID IN (
    SELECT BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID
    FROM BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL
    JOIN BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL
      ON BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID = BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID
    JOIN BIRD_ENTTY_RL_EIL
      ON BIRD_ENTTY_RL_EIL.PRTY_ID = BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL.PRTY_ID
    WHERE BIRD_ENTTY_RL_EIL.AGGRGTD_CMMTMNT_AMNT_ANCRDT_RPRTNG >= 25000
);

SET ANCRDT_ACCNTNG_C.DT_PRFRMNG_STTS =
    CASE
        WHEN BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_EIL.PRFRMNG_STTS = 11
        THEN BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_EIL.DT_INCPTN

        WHEN BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_EIL.PRFRMNG_STTS = 1 
        THEN BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_EIL.DT_NN_PRFRMNG_STTS_INSTRMNT
    END;

logical_transformation_rule.algorithm:
SET ANCRDT_ACCNTNG_C.INSTRMNT_ID = BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID
WHERE BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID IN (
    SELECT BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID
    FROM BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL
    JOIN BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL
      ON BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID = BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID
    JOIN BIRD_ENTTY_RL_EIL
      ON BIRD_ENTTY_RL_EIL.PRTY_ID = BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL.PRTY_ID
    WHERE BIRD_ENTTY_RL_EIL.AGGRGTD_CMMTMNT_AMNT_ANCRDT_RPRTNG >= 25000
);

SET ANCRDT_ACCNTNG_C.DT_PRFRMNG_STTS =
    CASE
        WHEN BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_EIL.PRFRMNG_STTS = 11
        THEN BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_EIL.DT_INCPTN

        WHEN BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_EIL.PRFRMNG_STTS = 1 
        THEN BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_EIL.DT_NN_PRFRMNG_STTS_INSTRMNT
    END;
